TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FabricClient/PropertyManagementClient extends System.Object

summary.para: Represents the property management client used to perform management of names and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task CreateNameAsync (Uri name);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CreateNameAsync(class System.Uri name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.para: The Service Fabric name.

summary.para: Creates the specified Service Fabric name.

returns.para: A task that represents the asynchronous create operation.

remarks.para: Timeout for the operation will be set to default timeout (1 minute).

exception.para: Caused by one of the following:
E_INVALIDARG is returned when one or more arguments are not valid.
Caused by one of the following:
E_POINTER is returned when a null reference is passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
is returned when the Service Fabric name already exists.
Caused by one of the following:
E_ABORT is returned when operation was aborted.
See for handling common FabricClient failures.
See for handling common FabricClient failures.
Caused by one of the following:
is returned when is not a valid Service Fabric name.
See also for handling common FabricClient failures.
This exception is thrown when an internal error has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Fabric.PropertyEnumerationResult> EnumeratePropertiesAsync (Uri name, bool includeValues, System.Fabric.PropertyEnumerationResult previousResult);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Fabric.PropertyEnumerationResult> EnumeratePropertiesAsync(class System.Uri name, bool includeValues, class System.Fabric.PropertyEnumerationResult previousResult) cil managed

param.name: name
param.para: The parent Service Fabric name.

param.name: includeValues
param.para: True if values should be returned with the metadata. False to return only property metadata; true to return property metadata and value.

param.name: previousResult
param.para: The batch result for the previous call. If this the first call, this field needs to be set to null.

summary.para: Enumerates all Service Fabric properties under a given name.

returns.para: A task that represents the asynchronous get operation.
If is true, then this result can be used as input to the next call.

remarks.para: Timeout for the operation will be set to default timeout (1 minute).
